project.title: Bookcrossing
project.text: Bookcrossing App is prepared as MVP. The main purpose of the application is to manage user's home library and exchange books with friends. App was created for educational purposes mainly, so that I could consolidate my knowledge of backend and frontend technologies. I used React.js with functional components and it has been deployed on Firebase. Back End project uses non relational database - Mongodb, and it's been deployed on Heroku. The connection to the database is made in the backend application written in Node.js which allows to integrate with frontend by API. You can find more information on this in the repository called `BookcrossingApp` on my GitHub profile in the ReadMe file.
